pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mixture Cure Model Estimation with Cure Status Partially Known // Performs nonparametric estimation in mixture cure models when the cure status is partially known. For details, see Safari et al (2021) doi:10.1002/bimj.202100156, Safari et al (2022) doi:10.1177/09622802221115880 and Safari et al (2023) doi:10.1007/s10985-023-09591-x.
